text: The Dragon King resides in the Dark Mountain cave and commands shadow drakes at dusk.
Healing potions cost 50 gold at Elara's stall in the central market.
King Alaric founded Aethelgard in year 300 after unifying the river clans.
Duke Varen betrayed King Alaric in year 402 to seize the Void Heart.
Blue Moon Flowers bloom only during a full moon in the Silver Glade.
Iron swords are effective against goblins but perform poorly against armored trolls.
The northern watchtower collapsed after a wyvern attack during a winter storm.
The royal archive admits only licensed scholars and guards with stamped writs.
Shadow Stalkers patrol the Whisper Woods and answer to the Dragon King.
The city watch processes theft claims by interviewing witnesses and inspecting ledgers.
Quest board job 17 requests herb gathering and pays 80 gold with no combat required.
Alchemist Neris offers discounts only to trusted guild members with clean records.
